qas.question: Can you name some common vegetables used in Cyprus?

answers.text: courgettes, green peppers, okra, green beans

qas.question: Can you name some common fruits used in Cyprus?
Can you name some common pulses used in Cyprus?

answers.text: beans, broad beans, peas, black-eyed beans

context: Fresh vegetables and fruits are common ingredients. Frequently used vegetables include <a0_0>courgettes, green peppers, okra, green beans<a0_0/>, artichokes, carrots, tomatoes, cucumbers, lettuce and grape leaves, and pulses such as <a2_0>beans, broad beans, peas, black-eyed beans<a2_0/>, chick-peas and lentils. The most common fruits and nuts are <a1_0>pears, apples, grapes, oranges, mandarines<a1_0/>, nectarines, medlar, blackberries, cherry, strawberries, figs, watermelon, melon, avocado, lemon, pistachio, almond, chestnut, walnut, and hazelnut.
